sentence.Network_en: He never scamped a job in the whole course of his life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他整整一生中,他从未马马虎虎地做过一件事.

list.abs: Hoy . hum . we should look around . of course , we sat here jawing for minute atop minute , so the scamps may be well away by now .嗬。嗯。我们应该四处看看。当然，我们坐在这里聊了几分钟，所以那些流氓现在已经跑了。
贱_百度百科 ... 贱狗[ pariah dog] 贱骨头[ contemptible wretch;worthless scamp] 贱货[ contemptible wretch].
Don ' t pamperdamp scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps ., 要宠潮湿恶棍流浪汉营地下坡道灯.
A gang of scamps threatened us ., 一帮流氓恐吓我们.

auth_sentence.content: She had scamped her work...not 'given her mind' to it.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had scamped her work...not 'given her mind' to it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had scamped her work...not 'given her mind' to it.
